name: FEINT (erehdys)
description:
Top down fighting game with an emphasis on movement and whiff punishment. Features rollback netcode.

P1 controls:
A - move left, D - move right
S - sidestep down, Space - sidestep up
Shift - magic shield
J - light attack, I - heavy attack
(forward refers to moving towards the opponent, back refers to moving away from the opponent)
J / forward + J - jab (fast safe attack used to interrupt or begin pressure)
down + J - left uppercut (longer range than the jab, but slightly slower and worse on block)
back + J - light magic attack (can hit opponents that would block an ordinary physical attack, needs to be defended against with the magic shield)
up + J - heavy magic attack (slow, reactable, but knocks down and deals more damage)
I /  forward + I - right hook (fast attack that deals a lot of damage if it interrupts an enemy's attack, but leaves you unable to follow up safely if blocked)
down + I - right uppercut (long range attack that deals a lot of damage, but is very unsafe when whiffed or blocked)
back + I - hook fist (attack that covers a lot of space and can catch sidestepping opponents)
up + I - overhead punch (slow long range attack that is neutral on block and deals a lot of damage if it interrupts an enemy's attack)
